messageBody:
This is a full-time position located in the SF bay area.

My client is looking for a Senior Test Automation Engineer to be
responsible for developing and maintaining an automated test
infrastructure, and creating white box tests that run within the test
infrastructure. This role works closely with development engineers to
understand detailed designs and effective ways to test the product
through test programs written in Java. The engineer must work in a
team environment and deliver to aggressive schedules in a fast-paced
setting. As a senior engineer, the position requires the ability to
drive projects, mentor more junior engineers, lead design efforts,
advanced skills and experience in Java programming.

Responsibilities
Design, implement, and maintain an automated test infrastructure.
Design test strategies using technical design specifications and
functional requirements documentation. Designs must be documented in
test plans and test specifications. Documents must pass peer and
management review for purpose, detail, and results.
Code tests in Java to test Java-based servers and applications.
Plan, schedule, and execute assignments to milestones.
Interact and communicate effectively across the engineering
organization.
Lead projects related to improving QA processes, developing QA tools,
and QA efforts associated with development projects.
Use bug-tracking system to report and track defects.
Troubleshoot problems found through testing.
Mentor junior engineers.

Qualifications
5 years of industry experience in software development or QA where
3GL programming was a requirement.
Must have solid grasp of testing principles and process. Extreme
Programming principles a plus.
Strong programming experience in Java.
Experienced in testing and delivering enterprise-level, distributed
applications.
Strong written and verbal communication skills. Must have experience
in writing clear, detailed test plans and specifications.
Hardcore troubleshooting skills.
Good understanding of relational databases and SQL.
Knowledge of JTest, JUnit, JProbe, LoadRunner a plus.
A proven ability to organize and prioritize tasks and to promote
quality throughout the software development process.
Familiarity with B2B software a plus.


Education
B. S. in Computer Science, or equivalent work experience.
